title: Make Get Started button functional on landing page

requirements.text: Add click handler to the Get Started button on the landing page that initiates Internet Identity authentication flow

quotes: No the get started button doesn't do anything

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Get Started button triggers the Internet Identity login process
After successful authentication, the user is redirected to either profile setup (if new user) or the MapView page (if existing user)
The button behavior matches the existing Login button functionality

constraints: Use the existing useInternetIdentity hook for authentication
Maintain consistency with the Login button's authentication flow
Do not modify the LandingPage.tsx layout or styling beyond the button functionality
nonGoals: Changing the visual appearance of the Get Started button
Modifying the authentication system or Internet Identity integration
Adding new user flows beyond the existing authentication pattern
